net.pandoragames.far.ui.model

Class MimeRegistry

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.pandoragames.far.ui.model.MimeRegistry

  • public abstract class MimeRegistry
extends java.lang.Object
    A registry for mime-type to file extension bindings.
    Author:
    Olivier Wehner

      • findMimeType

        public MimeType findMimeType(java.lang.String fileExtension)
        Finds the mime type for a given extension if any has been defined.
        Parameters:
        fileExtension - with, or without leading dot.
        Returns:
        associated mime type or null

      • createShadowRegistry

        public MimeRegistry createShadowRegistry()
        Creates a copy of this registry.
        Returns:
        copy of this registry.

      • registerExtension

        protected boolean registerExtension(java.lang.String extension,
                        MimeType mimeType)
        Registers a file extension for some mime type. If the file extension has been registered previously for some other mime type, it will be removed first.
        Parameters:
        extension - to be registered
        mimeType - type for wich to register the extension
        Returns:
        false if nothing has been registered

      • removeExtension

        protected void removeExtension(java.lang.String fileExtension)
        Removes a previously associated file extension. File extensions should be specified with a leading dot, but a plain extension is accepted also.
        Parameters:
        fileExtension - with, or without leading dot.
